noun.description: The most serious or unpleasant thing that could happen.
examples: when I saw the ambulance outside her front door, I began to fear the worst
this was not the time for a deep discussion—she was tired and she would be worsted

phrases: nothing's working at the moment, so I suppose you've seen us at our worst

origin: Old English wierresta, wyrresta (adjective), wierst, wyrst (adverb), of Germanic origin; related to worse.
